data: {"concept_id": "decision_style", "concept_name": "Decision Style", "type": "element", "definition": "A character’s characteristic way of choosing—speed, basis, risk, confidence, consistency, and influence—made visible at decision points.", "scope_notes": "Surfaced via declaration, habit, struggle, and consequences; potency dials from low→medium→high within and across scenes.", "axes": "dimension|potency", "axis_values": "speed|basis|risk_tolerance|confidence|consistency|external_influence | low|medium|high", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "beats|tension|backstory|body_logic|theme", "conflicts_with": "plot_puppetry|inconsistency|no_consequence|style_reset", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_decision_style_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_decision_style_weak_*", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_declare", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "", "description": "Character explicitly states or is stated to have a decision style.", "detection_hint": "Self/other/narrator declares tendencies or rules of choice.", "false_positive_risks": "Treating boasts as truth when behavior contradicts.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_habit", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "", "description": "Patterned behaviors reveal style (rituals, repeated moves, stock phrases).", "detection_hint": "Pros/cons lists, coin flips, instant launches, routinized avoidance.", "false_positive_risks": "One-off ticks mistaken for pattern.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_struggle", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "", "description": "Visible inner conflict before/after choices shows style under pressure.", "detection_hint": "Hesitation, reversals, conflicting dialogue, physical stress cues.", "false_positive_risks": "Melodramatic dithering without stakes.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_consequence", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "", "description": "Fallout chains display style through accountability, learning, or doubling down.", "detection_hint": "Track immediate + long-term effects; public/private handling.", "false_positive_risks": "Resets with no memory of prior choices.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_speed", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "speed", "description": "How fast decisions occur (impulsive↔deliberative).", "detection_hint": "Look for time-to-commit; interruptions tolerated or cut off.", "false_positive_risks": "Scene time manipulation can mask speed.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_basis", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "basis", "description": "Primary basis (emotion|logic|intuition|rules|social).", "detection_hint": "Quoted reasons, rationale patterns, mantra phrases.", "false_positive_risks": "Stated basis vs actual behavior may diverge.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_risk", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "risk_tolerance", "description": "Risk appetite (reckless|balanced|cautious).", "detection_hint": "Track stakes accepted vs avoided; sunk-cost doubling.", "false_positive_risks": "Context-dependent risk can flip by domain.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_confidence", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "confidence", "description": "Certainty posture (bold|wavering).", "detection_hint": "Hedges, ultimatums, vows, escalation patterns.", "false_positive_risks": "False bravado or masking humility.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_consistency", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "consistency", "description": "Style stability over time or by trigger.", "detection_hint": "Find repeating motifs; note growth arcs.", "false_positive_risks": "Randomness from plot forcing = puppetry.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_influence", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "external_influence", "description": "Susceptibility to others (independent|swayed|reactive).", "detection_hint": "Advice-seeking, defiance, mirroring dominant figures.", "false_positive_risks": "One-off persuasion ≠ chronic sway.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_potency_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Quiet drift/avoidance; decisions are small, reversible, or deferred.", "detection_hint": "Mood-forward scenes; soft stakes; private vacillation.", "false_positive_risks": "Zero trajectory: stasis without pressure.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_potency_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "Active, consequential choices with visible ripple and pushback.", "detection_hint": "Confrontations, tests, revising plans; some doubt remains.", "false_positive_risks": "Busy choices without effect.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "signal_id": "sig_potency_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "Irreversible commitment; bridges burned; identity at stake.", "detection_hint": "Ultimatums, sacrifices, no-exit maneuvers; public stakes.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle without lasting change.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "misconception_id": "plot_puppetry", "description": "Choices feel imposed by plot beats, not the character’s style.", "tells": "Sudden OOC flips to hit twists.", "likely_causes": "Outlining overrode motive signals.", "corrective_feedback": "Backfill evidence of style; let consequences stick.", "micro_drill": "Rewrite 1 scene to show a pre-signal before the ‘required’ choice.", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "misconception_id": "inconsistency", "description": "Declared style and enacted behavior don’t align over time.", "tells": "Says cautious; acts reckless without triggers.", "likely_causes": "Forgetting triggers or growth map.", "corrective_feedback": "Track triggers that justify flips; log deltas.", "micro_drill": "Map 3 scenes: declare→habit→consequence with one believable shift.", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "misconception_id": "no_consequence", "description": "Decisions reset next scene; nothing carries.", "tells": "Fallout vanishes; no learning/doubling.", "likely_causes": "Avoiding complexity.", "corrective_feedback": "Carry at least one cost forward three scenes.", "micro_drill": "List 3 consequences from a choice; write the smallest visible cost.", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"concept_id": "decision_style", "misconception_id": "style_reset", "description": "Style changes every scene with no cause.", "tells": "Random oscillation between extremes.", "likely_causes": "Chasing variety.", "corrective_feedback": "Tie changes to stakes or reveals; show hinge.", "micro_drill": "Write a hinge beat that explains a permanent style shift.", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_decision_identify_mode_dimension", "concept_id": "decision_style", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "For each passage, label surfacing mode (declare/habit/struggle/consequence) and the dominant decision dimension (speed/basis/risk/confidence/consistency/influence).", "expected_features": "Correct mode+dimension; cite text signal; note stake level.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels with sharp evidence and stake note", "Meets": "Mostly accurate with basic evidence", "Developing": "Labels or evidence off"}, "distractor_strategy": "Include red-herring ticks and boasts.", "hint_steps": "1) Spot cue 2) Choose mode 3) Choose dimension", "variation_axes": "mode|dimension", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_decision_mark_potency", "concept_id": "decision_style", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Mark potency (low/medium/high) and justify with consequence and commitment language.", "expected_features": "Potency justified by reversibility, publicness, and cost.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Potency ties to irreversible cost/public stake", "Meets": "Reasonable tie to cost or publicness", "Developing": "Hand-wavy or vibe-only"}, "distractor_strategy": "Spectacle w/out lasting change as trap.", "hint_steps": "1) Is there a bridge burned? 2) Who saw? 3) What changed?", "variation_axes": "potency", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_decision_escalate_or_deescalate", "concept_id": "decision_style", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Raise or lower the potency of the same choice by changing stakes, timing, publicness, or consequence.", "expected_features": "Concrete edits that change reversibility and cost.", "scoring_method": "count_features|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Edits clearly shift potency level and scene rhythm", "Meets": "Some shift with partial clarity", "Developing": "Wordier but same stakes"}, "distractor_strategy": "Adjective inflation instead of structural change.", "hint_steps": "1) Adjust stakes 2) Change audience 3) Add/remove cost", "variation_axes": "stakes|timing|publicness", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_decision_trace_chain", "concept_id": "decision_style", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "order", "prompt_template": "Arrange decisions and consequences into a causal chain; annotate where style becomes visible.", "expected_features": "Causality intact; style emergence marked; no resets.", "scoring_method": "pattern", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Chain shows learning/doubling with clear style markers", "Meets": "Causal chain present", "Developing": "Loose list; missing effects"}, "distractor_strategy": "Coincidental outcomes as traps.", "hint_steps": "1) Place choice 2) Place immediate fallout 3) Place long-term echo", "variation_axes": "cause_effect|learning", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_decision_fix_puppetry", "concept_id": "decision_style", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Fix a plot-puppetry moment by adding pre-signal and consistent follow-through.", "expected_features": "Pre-signal aligns motive; consequence persists.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Reads character-driven with sticky fallout", "Meets": "Some alignment and cost", "Developing": "Still plot-first"}, "distractor_strategy": "Empty declarations without behavior.", "hint_steps": "1) Add a habit cue 2) Foreshadow conflict 3) Land cost", "variation_axes": "motive|foreshadow", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_decision_style_1", "concept_id": "decision_style", "axis_value": "", "label": "strong", "text": "“I never hesitate.” She signs before he finishes the pitch.", "context_tags": "declare|speed|high", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_decision_style_2", "concept_id": "decision_style", "axis_value": "", "label": "strong", "text": "He flips a coin, grins, and orders two tickets anyway.", "context_tags": "habit|basis:intuition|risk_high", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_decision_style_3", "concept_id": "decision_style", "axis_value": "", "label": "strong", "text": "He drafts the text, deletes, drafts again; the call log stays empty.", "context_tags": "struggle|confidence_low|potency_low", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_decision_style_4", "concept_id": "decision_style", "axis_value": "", "label": "strong", "text": "She announces the plan at dinner; the group chat explodes by morning.", "context_tags": "public|consequence_chain|potency_medium", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_decision_style_5", "concept_id": "decision_style", "axis_value": "", "label": "strong", "text": "He burns the letter on the porch. Neighbors watch. He doesn’t look back.", "context_tags": "public|irreversible|potency_high", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_decision_style_weak_1", "concept_id": "decision_style", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "A twist makes her suddenly reckless for one scene, then she’s cautious again.", "context_tags": "style_reset", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_decision_style_weak_2", "concept_id": "decision_style", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "He ‘decides’ but nothing changes afterward.", "context_tags": "no_consequence", "source_file": "Character decision style.md", "source_md5": "ec383acc15fcf34b7b50fc4555bcef48", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:21:47.048565Z"}
